content: is a blended fibre with multiple colours i separated the colours into 4 groups as follows colour a light green colour b dark green colour c blue colour d pink i separated the fibre colours a b and c into bundles of approximately 1/3 and 2/3 of the fibre and spun in the following order 2/3 colour a light green 2/3 colour b dark green 2/3 colour c blue 3/3 colour d pink 1/3 colour c blue 1/3 colour b dark green 1/3 colour a light green the singles were navajo plied and the finished yarn was washed before knitting the finished yarn was knit in the order of spinning i e i cast on at the colour a 2/3 section this gives very wide bands of colour at the beginning of the shawl and shorter stripes as the shawl grows wider a similar effect could be achieved by dividing skeins in this way boom page 3 of 3
